title: Small domestic appliances : revenue in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2012 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million GBP for 28 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 2015 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2013.
There is a difference of 400.0 between the maximum Quarter Q4 2015 and minimum Quarter Q3 2013.
min_summary: This bar chart has 28 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in million GBP in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Revenue in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 2015 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2013.

max_summary: This bar chart has 28 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in million GBP in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q4 2015 has the highest Revenue in million GBP and Q3 2013 has the lowest Revenue in million GBP.
There is a difference of 400.0 between the maximum Quarter Q4 2015 and minimum Quarter Q3 2013.
Revenue in million GBP at Quarter Q4 2015 is 844.0 , second place is  at 531.0, and thirdly is Q4 2016 at 821.0.
Over the past 28 Quarters, the Revenue in million GBP has reduced.
Quarter Q2 2019, and Q2 2015 have a similar Revenue in million GBP that is 508.0.
The Quarter Q3 2013 tends to be 1.45 percent lower than average.
